conversations.body_text: Hi Lukáš Horváth,    Okay, we've updated your address for you.

Hello, thank you. I see zip 831 03 in the order, but I wrote you that the
correct one is 821 03

Dňa po 20. 10. 2025, 11:56 service@simsonn.com
Hi Lukas Horvath,    Apologies, we shall make the change for you.

Thank you, I see only one item (handbrake) in the shipment. Will the other
items be shipped separately, or are they all in the package that is on the
way?

Dňa ut 21. 10. 2025, 12:52 service@simsonn.com

Hello, I have just received pedals from my order. The order is missing the
base-plate, which I ordered


This is the full contents of the box I have received.

Dňa ut 21. 10. 2025, 20:44 Lukáš Horváth <horvathlukas723@gmail.com>
napísal(a):

> Thank you, I see only one item (handbrake) in the shipment. Will the other
> items be shipped separately, or are they all in the package that is on the
> way?
>
> Dňa ut 21. 10. 2025, 12:52 service@simsonn.com

Seriously, what is wrong with you? How can you send me the wrong product
when there is even a picture that this one has no baseplate on the front? I
am expecting you to propose a serious compensation on top of sending me the
baseplate first class express shipping of course. So I can have it here in
few days.
I am the founder of very well known simracing community and this mistake
will cost us a lot in damages, as this product was supposed to be used for
marketing porpouses!!!
